inheritPadding.description: Determines whether the section should inherit padding from the parent Card, false by default
inheritPadding.description_zh: 确定该部分是否应从父 Card 继承内边距，默认为 false

withBorder.description: Determines whether the section should have a border, false by default
withBorder.description_zh: 确定部分是否应具有边框，默认情况下为 false
